summary: This document is an appraisal report for a residential property located at 9 East 71st Street, New York, NY, commissioned by the Federal Bureau of Investigation. The appraisal, conducted by Gary D. Lane, estimates the market value of the property as of July 13, 2019, to be $86,250,000. The report outlines the methodology used, including a sales comparison approach, and notes that the appraisal was based on an exterior inspection only. This document contains appraisal reports for properties associated with the Epstein case, specifically focusing on the market listings for 9 East 71st Street in New York City. It details the original and current list prices, sale prices, and various property characteristics, providing a comprehensive overview of the real estate involved in the case.

persons.name: Gary D. Lane
persons.context: Gary D. Lane is the appraiser who conducted the appraisal of the property at 9 East 71st Street and provided the final opinion of value.

events.title: Property Appraisal
events.description: An appraisal of the residential property located at 9 East 71st Street was conducted to estimate its market value.

keyFacts: The appraisal report estimates the market value of the property at 9 East 71st Street to be $86,250,000.
The appraisal was based solely on an exterior inspection of the property.
The report was prepared for the Federal Bureau of Investigation.
The appraiser, Gary D. Lane, is a New York State Certified Residential Real Estate Appraiser.
The appraisal was conducted on July 13, 2019, with the report dated July 14, 2019.
The appraised value of the property at 9 East 71st Street is $86,250,000.
The original list price for 9 East 71st Street was $67,000,000.
The current list price for 9 East 71st Street remains at $67,000,000.
The property has been on the market for 186 days.
Comparable sales include properties at 14 East 67th Street and 110 East 76th Street, with sale prices of $77,160,600 and $40,250,000 respectively.
